## keysMap variable

Map of keyboard keys. The key in the map is a character produced by the key (either with or without pressing `Shift`<!-- -->). The value in the map is the key from the [Key](./vm-providers.key.md) enum.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keysMap: Map<string, Key>
```
